verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> reached הַגּוֹרָ֗ל <S%H1486><s%> [This] then was the lot לְמַטֵּ֛ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> by their families אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about גְּב֨וּל <S%H1366><s%> [even] to the border אֱד֧וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> the wilderness צִ֛ן <S%H6790><s%> of Zin נֶ֖גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> southward מִקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> [was] the uttermost part תֵימָֽן׃ <S%H8486><s%> of the south coast

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> border נֶ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> And their south מִקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> was from the shore יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַמֶּ֑לַח <S%H4417><s%> of the salt מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַלָּשֹׁ֖ן <S%H3956><s%> from the bay הַפֹּנֶ֥ה <S%H6437><s%> that looketh נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <S%H5045><s%> southward

וְ֠יָצָא <S%H3318><s%> And it went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִנֶּ֜גֶב <S%H5045><s%> to the south side לְמַעֲלֵ֤ה עַקְרַבִּים֙ <S%H4610><s%> to Maalehacrabbim וְעָ֣בַר <S%H5674><s%> and passed צִ֔נָה <S%H6790><s%> along to Zin וְעָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> and ascended up מִנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> on the south side לְקָדֵ֣שׁ בַּרְנֵ֑עַ <S%H6947><s%> unto Kadeshbarnea וְעָבַ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed חֶצְרוֹן֙ <S%H2696><s%> along to Hezron וְעָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> and went up אַדָּ֔רָה <S%H146><s%> to Adar וְנָסַ֖ב <S%H5437><s%> and fetched a compass הַקַּרְקָֽעָה׃ <S%H7173><s%> to Karkaa

וְעָבַ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> [From thence] it passed עַצְמ֗וֹנָה <S%H6111><s%> toward Azmon וְיָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> and went out נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto the river מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt [וְהָיָה כ] (וְהָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> become ק) תֹּצְא֥וֹת <S%H8444><s%> and the goings out הַגְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> of that coast יָ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> were at the sea זֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> This יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> coast נֶֽגֶב׃ <S%H5045><s%> this shall be your south

וּגְב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> border קֵ֙דְמָה֙ <S%H6924><s%> And the east יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַמֶּ֔לַח <S%H4417><s%> [was] the salt עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far קְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> [even] unto the end הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan וּגְב֞וּל <S%H1366><s%> And [their] border לִפְאַ֤ת <S%H6285><s%> quarter צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <S%H6828><s%> in the north מִלְּשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> [was] from the bay הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea מִקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> at the uttermost part הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan

וְעָלָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> went up הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> And the border בֵּ֣ית חָגְלָ֔ה <S%H1031><s%> to Bethhogla וְעָבַ֕ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed מִצְּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> along by the north לְבֵ֣ית הָעֲרָבָ֑ה <S%H1026><s%> of Betharabah וְעָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> went up הַגְּב֔וּל <S%H1366><s%> and the border אֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> to the stone בֹּ֖הַן <S%H932><s%> of Bohan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben

וְעָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> went up הַגְּב֥וּל ׀ <S%H1366><s%> And the border דְּבִרָה֮ <S%H1688><s%> toward Debir מֵעֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> from the valley עָכוֹר֒ <S%H5911><s%> of Achor וְצָפ֜וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> and so northward פֹּנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> looking אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַגִּלְגָּ֗ל <S%H1537><s%> toward Gilgal אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נֹ֙כַח֙ <S%H5227><s%> that [is] before לְמַעֲלֵ֣ה <S%H4608><s%> the going up אֲדֻמִּ֔ים <S%H131><s%> to Adummim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which מִנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> which [is] on the south side לַנָּ֑חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the river וְעָבַ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> passed הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> and the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward מֵי־ <S%H4325><s%> toward the waters עֵ֣ין שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H5885><s%> of Enshemesh וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> and the goings תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> and the goings out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward עֵ֥ין רֹגֵֽל׃ <S%H5883><s%> thereof were at Enrogel

וְעָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> went up הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border גֵּ֣י <S%H1516><s%> by the valley בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the son הִנֹּ֗ם <S%H2011><s%> of Hinnom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> side הַיְבוּסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> of the Jebusite מִנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> unto the south הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> the same [is] Jerusalem וְעָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> went up הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> and the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> to the top הָהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> of the mountain אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> that [lieth] before גֵֽי־ <S%H1516><s%> the valley הִנֹּם֙ <S%H2011><s%> of Hinnom יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> westward אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> which [is] at the end עֵֽמֶק־ <S%H6010><s%> of the valley רְפָאִ֖ים <S%H7497><s%> of the giants צָפֹֽנָה׃ <S%H6828><s%> northward

וְתָאַ֨ר <S%H8388><s%> was drawn הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border מֵרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> from the top הָהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> of the hill אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַעְיַן֙ <S%H4599><s%> unto the fountain מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> of the water נֶפְתּ֔וֹחַ <S%H5318><s%> of Nephtoah וְיָצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> and went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> to the cities הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> of mount עֶפְר֑וֹן <S%H6085><s%> Ephron וְתָאַ֤ר <S%H8388><s%> was drawn הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> and the border בַּעֲלָ֔ה <S%H1173><s%> to Baalah הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he קִרְיַ֥ת יְעָרִֽים׃ <S%H7157><s%> which [is] Kirjathjearim

וְנָסַב֩ <S%H5437><s%> compassed הַגְּב֨וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border מִבַּעֲלָ֥ה <S%H1173><s%> from Baalah יָ֙מָּה֙ <S%H3220><s%> westward אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> unto mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> Seir וְעָבַ֕ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כֶּ֧תֶף <S%H3802><s%> along unto the side הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> of mount יְעָרִ֛ים <S%H3297><s%> Jearim מִצָּפ֖וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> on the north side הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> he כְסָל֑וֹן <S%H3693><s%> which [is] Chesalon וְיָרַ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> and went down בֵּֽית־ שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> to Bethshemesh וְעָבַ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed on תִּמְנָֽה׃ <S%H8553><s%> to Timnah

וְיָצָ֨א <S%H3318><s%> went out הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כֶּ֣תֶף <S%H3802><s%> unto the side עֶקְרוֹן֮ <S%H6138><s%> of Ekron צָפוֹנָה֒ <S%H6828><s%> northward וְתָאַ֤ר <S%H8388><s%> was drawn הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> and the border שִׁכְּר֔וֹנָה <S%H7942><s%> to Shicron וְעָבַ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed along הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> to mount הַֽבַּעֲלָ֖ה <S%H1173><s%> Baalah וְיָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> and went out יַבְנְאֵ֑ל <S%H2995><s%> unto Jabneel וְהָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> and the goings תֹּצְא֥וֹת <S%H8444><s%> and the goings out הַגְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> of the border יָֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> were at the sea

וּגְב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> border יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> And the west הַיָּ֥מָּה <S%H3220><s%> sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [was] to the great וּגְב֑וּל <S%H1366><s%> and the coast זֶ֠ה <S%H2088><s%> This גְּב֧וּל <S%H1366><s%> [thereof] This [is] the coast בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> according to their families

וּלְכָלֵ֣ב <S%H3612><s%> And unto Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְפֻנֶּ֗ה <S%H3312><s%> of Jephunneh נָ֤תַן <S%H5414><s%> he gave חֵ֙לֶק֙ <S%H2506><s%> a part בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> according פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִֽיהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> to Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִרְיַ֥ת אַרְבַּ֛ע <S%H7153><s%> Kiriath-arba אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> the father הָעֲנָ֖ק <S%H6061><s%> of Anak הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> which חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H2275><s%> which [city is] Hebron

וַיֹּ֤רֶשׁ <S%H3423><s%> drove מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there כָּלֵ֔ב <S%H3612><s%> And Caleb אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלוֹשָׁ֖ה <S%H7969><s%> thence the three בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons הָעֲנָ֑ק <S%H6061><s%> of Anak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁשַׁ֤י <S%H8344><s%> Sheshai וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִימַן֙ <S%H289><s%> and Ahiman וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּלְמַ֔י <S%H8526><s%> and Talmai יְלִידֵ֖י <S%H3211><s%> the children הָעֲנָֽק׃ <S%H6061><s%> of Anak

וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> And he went up מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> thence to the inhabitants דְּבִ֑ר <S%H1688><s%> of Debir וְשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> and the name דְּבִ֥ר <S%H1688><s%> of Debir לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> before קִרְיַת־ סֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H7158><s%> [was] Kirjathsepher

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said כָּלֵ֔ב <S%H3612><s%> And Caleb אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יַכֶּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> He that smiteth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִרְיַת־ סֵ֖פֶר <S%H7158><s%> Kirjathsepher וּלְכָדָ֑הּ <S%H3920><s%> and taketh וְנָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> it to him will I give ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַכְסָ֥ה <S%H5915><s%> Achsah בִתִּ֖י <S%H1323><s%> my daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וַֽיִּלְכְּדָ֛הּ <S%H3920><s%> took עָתְנִיאֵ֥ל <S%H6274><s%> And Othniel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קְנַ֖ז <S%H7073><s%> of Kenaz אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> the brother כָלֵ֑ב <S%H3612><s%> of Caleb וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> it and he gave ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַכְסָ֥ה <S%H5915><s%> him Achsah בִתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּבוֹאָ֗הּ <S%H935><s%> And it came to pass as she came וַתְּסִיתֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5496><s%> [unto him] that she moved לִשְׁא֤וֹל <S%H7592><s%> him to ask מֵֽאֵת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1><s%> of her father שָׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> a field וַתִּצְנַ֖ח <S%H6795><s%> and she lighted off מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from הַחֲמ֑וֹר <S%H2543><s%> [her] ass וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said לָ֥הּ כָּלֵ֖ב <S%H3612><s%> and Caleb מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> to her What לָּֽךְ׃

וַתֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Who answered תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לִּ֣י בְרָכָ֗ה <S%H1293><s%> me a blessing כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> since אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <S%H5045><s%> me a south נְתַתָּ֔נִי <S%H5414><s%> for thou hast given וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> give לִ֖י גֻּלֹּ֣ת <S%H1543><s%> me also springs מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> And he gave לָ֗הּ אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> גֻּלֹּ֣ת <S%H1543><s%> springs עִלִּיּ֔וֹת <S%H5942><s%> her the upper וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> גֻּלֹּ֥ת <S%H1543><s%> springs תַּחְתִּיּֽוֹת׃ <S%H8482><s%> and the nether פ

זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> according to their families
